entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
